meta.name: ü§ñ Build Resilient AI Workflows with Automatic GPT and Gemini Failover Chain

parameters.content:
### ‚öôÔ∏è CONFIGURE YOUR FALLBACK CHAIN HERE ‚öôÔ∏è

This node selects which AI model to use based on the number of previous failures.

**To set up your models:**
1.  Add your desired AI model nodes to the canvas (OpenAI, Gemini, Anthropic, etc.).
2.  Connect them to **THIS** node's `ai_languageModel` input.


**IMPORTANT:** The **order** you connect them in is the order they will be tried.

#### üìù DEFINE YOUR PROMPT HERE

Enter the prompt or task for the AI agent in this node.

It will dynamically use the models provided one-by-one from the `Fallback Models` node. If it fails, it will automatically retry with the next model in your chain.

#### üîÅ Loop Controller

This node manages the retry loop.

It initializes and increments a `fail_count` variable each time the `AI Agent` fails, which tells the `Fallback Models` node to try the next model in the list.

No configuration is needed here.

## Was this helpful? Let me know!

I really hope this template helped you understand how Langchain code works here in n8n. Your feedback is incredibly valuable and helps me create better resources for the n8n community.

### **Share Your Thoughts & Ideas**

Whether you have a suggestion, found a typo, or just want to say thanks, I'd love to hear from you!
Here's a simple n8n form built for this purpose:

#### ‚û°Ô∏è **[Click here to give feedback](https://api.ia2s.app/form/templates/feedback?template=Fallback%20Agent)**

If you're looking to take your n8n skills or business automation to the next level, I can help.
